outputs.output_descr: The project aims at supporting the monitoring activities of the complementary adjustment signed with the Brazilian Ministry of Planning (project 61767). The project also supports the monitoring of the development of the Human Development Report which intends to help deepen the debate on the theme of human development in the country with analysis and topics adapted to the national context.

The project aims at supporting the monitoring activities of the complementary adjustment signed with the Brazilian Ministry of Planning (project 61767). The project also supports the monitoring of the development of the Human Development Report which intends to help deepen the debate on the theme of human development in the country with analysis and topics adapted to the national context.

project_descr: com foco no desenvolvimento de capacidades estratégicas e apoio institucional.
